Desc.entry: Leading national charity that supports and campaigns for children and adults who are deafblind. Provides expert advice and information as well as specialist services to deafblind people, their familiesw,carers and professionals who sork with them. Also supports people who have sensory impairments with additional disabilities. Has an adult day service in Wakefield and Rotherham, a supported living service in Rotherham, residential homes in Leeds as well as a range of outreach services.

category.entry: DEAF AND BLIND PEOPLE - ORGANISATIONS FOR
